node.excerpt: This is the second post in my work based learning blog series. If you need some context, or some of the things just aren't making sense, read the  previous entry . The previous blog entry was full of verbose analysis and self-reflection. It turns out…

It feels good to be back at work. Since completing my placement as a software engineer, I have continued my studies at university. As much as the relaxed atmosphere of home working can be a welcome break after a hectic year of moving house twice…
